meanings: (목숨이 끊어지다) die (of/from), (완곡한 표현) pass away[on], (타인에 의해) be killed, (literary) expire, (literary) perish, (lite...
감정 You have a death wish.
감정 I think you need to be taught a lesson?

meanings.meaning: If you want to die in bed

vlive.korean: 죽고 싶지 않아요... I don't want to die. 듣기 View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 전생 체험하다가 죽음을 경험한 로켓펀치 연희 #아이돌 #리얼리티 ┃로켓펀치 [펀치타임
너 진짜 죽고 싶냐? Do you want to die? 듣기 View video 컨스TV : 그날 밤 일 죽어도 얘기 안하려고...[넘버식스]ep7.
[죽고 싶다... 그냥 죽어 버릴까...] [I want to die. I want to kill myself...] View video tvN D : 내신등급이 내 인생의 등급일까? [언어의 온도 : 우리의 열아홉] Ep.1
vlive.english: [I want to die. I want to kill myself...]

vlive.korean: 죽고 싶지 않아 제발 [그런 거 말고 드립 내놔] - 그래서 뭔데 너는? I don't want to die. [Give us a joke] - So what are you? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.3 돈't Lie #1 (Don't Lie #1)
vlive.english: I don't want to die. [Give us a joke] - So what are you?

vlive.korean: 죽고 싶어서 안달일까? Why does everyone want to die? 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : [목숨값] Ep09 나 때문에 싸우는 두 남자
vlive.english: Why does everyone want to die?

examples.korean: After his first wife died, he married again with almost indecent haste. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 첫째 부인이 죽고 난 후 거의 남부끄러울 정도로 서둘러 재혼을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: After his first wife died, he married again with almost indecent haste. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She sold the house soon after her husband died. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 남편이 죽고 머지않아 그 집을 팔았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She sold the house soon after her husband died. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You’ll be sorry you said that when I’m dead and gone. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내가 죽고 나면 당신 그런 말 한 거 후회할 거예요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’ll be sorry you said that when I’m dead and gone. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His wife had wanted to whitewash his reputation after he died. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 아내는 그가 죽고 난 후에 그의 평판에 대해 눈가림을 하려고 했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His wife had wanted to whitewash his reputation after he died. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: After you die, your soul goes to heaven. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 죽고 나면 당신의 영혼은 천국으로 갑니다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: After you die, your soul goes to heaven. Add to Wordbook
